issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Simple workflow error / stack trace logged when polling for activities

comments.body: [~sjones], if this is very targeted let us know asap, otherwise we'll fix in 4.1.1

The error from the description is no longer logged.

Note that it is expected that the stack creation will fail and that errors other than those in the description are still logged when using the steps to reproduce for this issue, e.g.:

{code}
Tue Jan 20 10:33:44 2015 ERROR [StackActivityImpl:SWF Activity  CloudFormationTaskList 3] [com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.StackActivityImpl.performCreateStep(StackActivityImpl.groovy):368] com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException: No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307'
com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException: No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307'
        at com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.resources.standard.actions.AWSEC2SecurityGroupIngressResourceAction$CreateSteps$1.perform(AWSEC2SecurityGroupIngressResourceAction.java:104)
        at com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.StackActivityImpl.performCreateStep(StackActivityImpl.groovy:340)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor1663.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation.execute(POJOActivityImplementation.java:64)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.generic.ActivityImplementationBase.execute(ActivityImplementationBase.java:46)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.execute(SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java:196)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTaskPoller$2.run(ActivityTaskPoller.java:92)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Tue Jan 20 10:33:45 2015 ERROR [SynchronousActivityTaskPoller:SWF Activity  CloudFormationTaskList 3] [com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.execute(SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java):207] Failure processing activity task with taskId=350, workflowGenerationId=a0c8817d-df33-401e-88b0-b6acce471b53, activity={Name: StackActivity.performCreateStep,Version: 1.0}, activityInstanceId=74
com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.ActivityFailureException: com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException:No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307' : ["com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.ResourceFailureException",{"cause":null,"stackTrace":[{"methodName":"performCreateStep","fileName":"StackActivityImpl.groovy","lineNumber":386,"className":"com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.workflow.StackActivityImpl","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"invoke","fileName":null,"lineNumber":-1,"className":"sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor1663","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"invoke","fileName":"DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java","lineNumber":43,"className":"sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"invoke","fileName":"Method.java","lineNumber":606,"className":"java.lang.reflect.Method","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"execute","fileName":"POJOActivityImplementation.java","lineNumber":64,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"execute","fileName":"ActivityImplementationBase.java","lineNumber":46,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.generic.ActivityImplementationBase","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"execute","fileName":"SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java","lineNumber":196,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"run","fileName":"ActivityTaskPoller.java","lineNumber":92,"className":"com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTaskPoller$2","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"runWorker","fileName":"ThreadPoolExecutor.java","lineNumber":1145,"className":"java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"run","fileName":"ThreadPoolExecutor.java","lineNumber":615,"className":"java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker","nativeMethod":false},{"methodName":"run","fileName":"Thread.java","lineNumber":745,"className":"java.lang.Thread","nativeMethod":false}],"message":"com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException:No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307'","localizedMessage":"com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException:No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307'","suppressed":["[Ljava.lang.Throwable;",[]]}]
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation.throwActivityFailureException(POJOActivityImplementation.java:110)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.pojo.POJOActivityImplementation.execute(POJOActivityImplementation.java:67)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.generic.ActivityImplementationBase.execute(ActivityImplementationBase.java:46)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.execute(SynchronousActivityTaskPoller.java:196)
        at com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.worker.ActivityTaskPoller$2.run(ActivityTaskPoller.java:92)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1145)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:615)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Tue Jan 20 10:33:51 2015 ERROR [CreateStackWorkflowImpl:SWF Decider CloudFormationTaskList 2] [org.apache.log4j.Category$error$1.call(?):?] com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.ActivityTaskFailedException: com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException:No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307' for activityId="74" of activityType={Name: StackActivity.performCreateStep,Version: 1.0}
Tue Jan 20 10:33:53 2015 ERROR [CreateStackWorkflowImpl:SWF Decider CloudFormationTaskList 2] [org.apache.log4j.Category$error$1.call(?):?] com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.ActivityTaskFailedException: com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException:No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307' for activityId="74" of activityType={Name: StackActivity.performCreateStep,Version: 1.0}
Tue Jan 20 10:33:54 2015 ERROR [CreateStackWorkflowImpl:SWF Decider CloudFormationTaskList 1] [org.apache.log4j.Category$error$1.call(?):?] com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.ActivityTaskFailedException: com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException:No such group with name 'sg-a23bd307' for activityId="74" of activityType={Name: StackActivity.performCreateStep,Version: 1.0}
{code}

Fix Verified.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.1.0
Release     : 0.0.23038.363.20150120git689fdd5.el6

Original error is no longer present (however stack creation fails as explained and has corresponding error logged)
{code}
2015-01-20 22:05:01 ERROR | com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException: No such group with name 'sg-66a6e92a'
com.eucalyptus.cloudformation.ValidationErrorException: No such group with name 'sg-66a6e92a'
